full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO SENG GE'I GDONG CAN MA LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(STOBS LDAN YE SHES MKHA' 'GRO GSHEGS GTOR 'DI, DAD LDAN DAR HAN GNANG GSOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, GA-YENG LDAN BLO BZANG MING 'CHANG BA GYIS PA NI, ,MTSAN LDAN BLA MA'I GSUNG GZHIR YE GER BKOD , RANG LA RIG SHES KHAB MIG TZAM MED KYANG, BSKUL BA PO LA YI YANG YANG TZAB KHRAL GYIS, BRIS PA 'DI LA NONGS GANG 'GYUR KYANG, MKHA' 'GRO RNAMS SPYAN SNGAR BZOD PAR GSOL, ,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
